Description: Weight; bronze; barrel shaped; with a groove incised in the top and bottom.
Curator's comments: Parallels: P. Balog, "Islamic Bronze Weights from Egypt", Journal of the Economic and Social History of the Orient 13 (1970) 233-256; L. Holland, "Islamic Bronze Weights from Caesarea Maritima", Museum Notes: American Numismatic Society 31 (1986) 171-201.
